snippet.title: In My Shadow | Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
In My Shadow : coming to Steam on 8th April 2021!

The journey finally has a date now. Thank you to everyone who has showed their love and support for this game. The journey wouldn't have been possible without all your support! 

Music for the trailer by Myuu - https://youtube.com/myuuji , do check his amazing work out!

Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1406200/In_My_Shadow

Join the Shadow Community
DISCORD: https://inmyshadow.com/discord
NEWSLETTER : https://inmyshadow.com/newsletter
TWITTER : https://twitter.com/playbaegames
INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/playbaegames
FACEBOOK : https://facebook.com/playbaegames
